attributes.action: Remove all Scottish,Irish & Welsh MPs and create a real English Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The PM is scottish The former leader of The L Ds is scottish 

Scotland has Free Uni places, Free Prescriptions and a host of other Perks 

England has None

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
